search.slidetext: --- start course start course start course start course start course start course electronic injury & illness prevention program safety services

submitting and signing 4 filling out the iipp 3 starting the process 2 roles 1 table of contents this module is approximately 10 minutes long electronic injury & illness prevention program %project.slidenumber%|%project.totalslides% download the course companion to follow along download the course companion to follow along electronic injury & illness prevention program
dsc authority 1&2 eh&s administrator iipp system roles %project.slidenumber%|%project.totalslides%
dsc authority 1&2 administrator iipp system roles fills out the plan and sends it for review and approval %project.slidenumber%|%project.totalslides%

dsc authority 1&2 administrator iipp system roles responsible for and approves iipp for department or unit individual responsible to maintain and implement the iipp %project.slidenumber%|%project.totalslides%
dsc authority 1&2 administrator iipp system roles reviews and approves the completed and signed plan %project.slidenumber% of %project.totalslides% %project.slidenumber%|%project.totalslides%
iipp system roles %project.slidenumber% of %project.totalslides% comments enter the reason for declining contact info for the correct person %project.slidenumber%|%project.totalslides%

xxx-xxx-xxxx %project.slidenumber% of %project.totalslides% if your department has more than 16 buildings, please attach a file with the information at the end of this document %project.slidenumber%|%project.totalslides%
xxx-xxx-xxxx %project.slidenumber% of %project.totalslides% authority 1 and 2 cannot be the same person %project.slidenumber%|%project.totalslides%

resource_data.description: Here are some useful links and documents:

slidetranscripts.slidetranscript:
<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="There are 3 roles in the IIPP system, assigned to 3 different people: the DSC, the authorities 1 and 2, and the EH & S Administrator.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block /> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="The DSC is the person who fills out the plan and sends it for review and approval.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block /> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="and the EH&S Administrator reviews and approves the completed signed plan.
" /> </Block> <Block /> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="The IIPP process starts with the DSC receiving an email from DocuSign.
" /> </Block> <Block /> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="To navigate through your document, you can use the next button at the top left of the page, or use the scroll bar to move up and down the page." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>
